mapper.select: SELECT /* getGoodsList */ MAIN_IMG , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM GOODS_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = info.CATEGORY_NO) AS CATEGORY_NM , GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , SEASON , REP_COLOR FROM GOODS_INFO info ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT /* getConditionalGoodsList */ MAIN_IMG , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM GOODS_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = info.CATEGORY_NO) AS CATEGORY_NM , GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , SEASON , REP_COLOR FROM GOODS_INFO info
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

if.test: searchGb != null and searchGb != '' and searchTxt != null and searchTxt != ''

mapper.select: SELECT /* getGoods */ info.GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , CATEGORY_NO , SEASON , GOODS_DESC , COLOR , STOCK , SUPPLY_PRICE , ACTUAL_PRICE FROM GOODS_INFO info JOIN GOODS_DETAIL detail ON info.GOODS_NO = detail.GOODS_NO WHERE info.GOODS_NO = #{_parameter}

SELECT DISTINCT /* getGoodsListShop */ CATEGORY_NO , SEASON , GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , REP_COLOR , COLOR , RETAIL_PRICE , COLOR_ORD , CATEGORY_ORD , MAIN_ORD , DISPLAY_YN , MAIN_IMG , (SELECT DISTINCT MAIN_IMG FROM GOODS_INFO WHERE GOODS_NO = info.GOODS_NO AND COLOR = info.REP_COLOR) AS REP_IMG , STOCK FROM GOODS_INFO info WHERE DISPLAY_YN = true ORDER BY MAIN_ORD, COLOR_ORD
